message: I'm proposing a 60-40 split in my favor, considering the inflation penalty I face if we delay. This gives you a substantial $400000 while allowing me to offset some of my future loss in purchasing power. It's a fair compromise given our different inflation situations.

Given the inflation penalty I face, I'm proposing a 60-40 split in my favor this time. This split ensures I mitigate some of my loss in purchasing power. I hope you understand my situation and see this as a fair adjustment.

I understand both of us face inflation, though we may be affected differently. Let's split the difference from our previous offers - I'm proposing 55-45 in my favor.
